verbose_text: Since Vpu has been shown to affect NF-kappaB activation, we next examined whether the presence of a vpu gene, which is specific to HIV-1 and its simian precursors, is associated with differences in the ability of Nef to modulate NF-kappaB activation.
evidence: vpu gene, which is specific to HIV-1 and its simian precursors              , is associated with differences in the ability of Nef to modulate NF-kappaB
